body_html: @ebrevdo thanks again for your reply, I am trying the dynamic_rnn, but got confused with the parameter sen_len, if I send in a 1-dim tensor of lengths of sentences in the batch, What shape would the output of dynamic_rnn be? will the last time_step of this output still be right? and why output[:,sen_len,:] couldnt' work? Thank you.
